description:
This blended learning module aims to equip penultimate year and graduating students with (1) advanced career preparation skills to increase their career opportunities; and (2) essential workplace success skills to excel in their first graduate job. 

This module integrates an elearning component and a live component (face-to-face workshop or webinar) and is structured around five topics. 

Through this module, students would be better prepared to create their personal branding to strategically position themselves for job applications, gain new career opportunities and expand their network and, more importantly, to succeed at their future careers.
title: Career Advancement
